snippet: As China announced a sixth death Friday from the mysterious new H7N9 flu, health officials said they were formulating a seed vaccine.
abstract: Federal health officials have begun to make seed vaccine against  H7N9 flu circulating in China; Centers for Disease Control and Prevention officials emphasize that vaccine is being made only as precaution.

byline.original: By DONALD G. McNEIL Jr. and ANDREW JACOBS
byline.contributor: Donald G. McNeil Jr. reported from New York, and Andrew Jacobs from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: As China announced a sixth death Friday from the mysterious new H7N9 flu, health officials said they were formulating a seed vaccine.

headline.seo: C.D.C. Has Begun Work on Vaccine for New China Flu
headline.main: C.D.C. Begins Work on Vaccine for China Flu
headline.print_headline: C.D.C. Work On Vaccine For China Flu Has Begun

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations
